entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Periods of wet snow over higher terrain this morning. Wind light except south 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
